def.name: h!@
def.ds: a1 u1 a2 u2 -- a u1

export.def: xt ( a1 u1 a-name u-name -- ) enum-alist

forth.rem: The name 'parse-header' is preferable to 'store-header'. The 'store' is used for only store.

def.name: parse-header?
def.ds: a u -- a u false | true

forth.def: `: SPLIT DUP DROP FINE-HEAD 2SWAP h! TRUE
